website_summaries.verdict: Fast-performing Android streaming box that’s also easy to use thanks to a voice control option.
pros: Delivers 4K video resolution, so you can make use of any video
Has an above-average CPU and GPU, so you’ll receive the performance you need from the processors
cons: Doesn’t have a lot of improvements over previous versions of the Mi Box streaming box

customer_reviews.title: Official Android TV software is very restricted
customer_reviews.text: If you're into the official Android TV software then this box will be perfect for you. I couldn't handle how restricted it is. You can't even download any real apps one might actually want! It's mainly for streaming from the big name apps(Netflix, Hulu, YouTube etc). I decided to go with the H96 max plus box running Android 9.0 and I couldn't be happier! It's running pure Android 9.0, it has on/off functionality, dual USB ports (one USB 3.0), Ethernet, 3.5mm jack and stays cool due to its vents. And.... It's only $43 on Amazon. I'm not sure how they can sale it for that price as amazing as it is!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Tambunga

customer_reviews.title: Great Box, Great platform...few quirks
customer_reviews.text: I love Android TV, and the ability to organize, customize, and what-not. The UI is what I have been looking for, and I have 3 Chinese boxes that I have ditched because I couldn't replicate. I have had little to no issues with buffering or quality. My biggest issue is how difficult it is to get Prime Video onto the platform, but hopefully with updates and a new cooperation, we should (fingers crossed) get that.
customer_reviews.author: eric daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I'm well impressed by this device. It has exceeded my expectations for this type of little known TV interface alternative. Unlike other such devices this one supports Netflix and Sling which I use enough to be worth keeping. Also, device is advertised as Android 8, but it upgraded itself to Android 9 once it was on wifi. It's been fully functional since day 1, picture is very good quality even for non 4K signal. The user interface could be made a little more intuitive. The volume control on the remote is very handy.
customer_reviews.author: CarPerz

customer_reviews.title: Slow, klunky, undependable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tv box, along with the recommended U-Green USB hub, so I could use it with Ethernet, in a hardwired location with poor Wi-Fi. The first thing it did was update to OS 9, which apparently disabled that feature and added a host of new bugs. A worthless device, with a useless converter, until Xiaomi gets its act together. Very slow, with a klunky interface, as well. Should have bought American. ;)
customer_reviews.author: M. Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great Android TV device!
customer_reviews.text: This really is a great device, there's just no instructions / manual that comes with it. You better not be tech adverse. Setup is a breeze, but I couldn't figure out why platform apps weren't showing up until I went online and discovered that I needed to update the OS on the device. Once I went through the user interface and made those updates everything has worked great and all platforms are supported. Would be nice if it just came with an overview of the settings menu options. The only reason I didn't give it a perfect score.
customer_reviews.author: No Criticism Too Small

customer_reviews.title: Best little box for price.
customer_reviews.text: Best little box around! Fast. Stays connected to my wifi. Layout is actually really comfortable to use and easy to navigate. The voice search.... Amazing feature. Family thinks I'm crazy for being able to talk to the tv, but hey.... Lol. It works so well. Remote also doesn't have to be pointing directly to the box... like others I've had. I suggest a double sided tape or command strip under the box because it is so light. It moves around. Can't download external apps to it, sonif you're trying to do titanium or typhoon tv, look for another box. (Can't get browser on this box to download the files). Hope this helps someone! Great box!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: A long way from being a Nvidia Shield
customer_reviews.text: I have a Shield and once owned the earlier Mi Box. I decided to give the C a try on a second TV and frankly I was underwhelmed. I found it slow, laggy, and glitchy. I cannot recommend this. I returned mine right away and ordered a new Stick 4K, now my third in use. With the Stick 4K, I know it will work, the picture will be excellent, and it will perform perfectly and will be kept up to date. After using the C for a while, I later fired up my 2017 Shield and realized there is zero comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Griffin

customer_reviews.title: It auto updates
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered a few of these for family and friends for streaming TV apps. Works well. Updates are sent to it. My original one is over two years old and have and have a second one in the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Burrows

customer_reviews.title: Terrible 5GHz reception
customer_reviews.text: So far it is working good but there's a problem with 5GHz band. It never connects unless you do modifications to your router (never had to do this with my Nvidia Shield or my second gen Fire Stick). It seems that if you have your 5GHz band channel width set up for 20/40/80 it never connects; I had to change it to 20/40 in order to have it working.
customer_reviews.author: Armando

customer_reviews.title: Want to watch BTS’ V Lives on your tv?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this exclusively so that I could stream BTS content from V Live to my tv. It works well for that. One significant thing to note is that you will not be able to fast forward or rewind their full length concerts. It just doesn’t work. Some other cons: -laggy -the control is terrible, there is a lot of frustrated repeat clicking involved -sometimes the box just won’t turn on and I’ll have to disconnect the power for it to work again All in all, I am glad I bought this box as it allows me to watch V Live content on my tv and I’m really happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: Maribel Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Far From a complete solution
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to replace my crappy Amazon 4K sticks and this looked promising. My expectations were crushed, I'm still stuck with the Amazon 4k sticks. Pros: Inexpensive Easy to set up Bluetooth Cons: No Amazon Prime Video! No decent web browser like Chrome or Firefox REALLY limited app support, even Yahoo mail can't be installed Remote doesn't control the TV volume or power You really need a mouse to use some apps Sending it back
customer_reviews.author: daChurchPcGuy

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmm
customer_reviews.text: The older remote was easier to use. I use the up & down portion of the center selector. It was raised with the older remote this one is not, more difficult to use. I use Plex to for TV recordings. The new version of Plex Player does work on the Mi Box S yet, I have to use the old player. Not crazy about them putting NETFLIX as a stand alone button on the remote. I don't subscribe to Netflix so I took it off the menu. Now its part of my remote, what's up with that. Should have stayed with he older Mi Box for a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: This met my expectations for ease of use. Setup is a pain because you have to type usernames and passwords to login, but after that, it works well. I have used Apple, Amazon fire Tv, Roku and this. They are all very comparable and I wouldn't be worried about buying another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Skype

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy this thinking you can add to the memory with a thumb drive..... You can add it but the apps will lag and play like crap!!! It says you have 16 gig of memory but its all filled up with junk only leaving you 5 gig to download anything. Update : 2/12/2020 After just a few months HULU is now lagging and you cant even watch it anymore. All other streaming apps work except HULU. Called HULU customer support and nothing wrong on there end. This thing is going down hill fast.
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: No Groups Support
customer_reviews.text: I used this to replace my Chromecast Ultra. The inability to add this to Audio Groups (Where all my chromecast and chromecast audio devices sync and play the same song all throughout the house) is HUGE deal breaker for me. Plus no Amazon Prime support. I'm thinking about returning it. UPDATE: The PLEX App is TERRIBLE. I get an error message whenever I try to play something from the standalone app, but when I cast it from my Phone it works fine. At this point, I might as well as go back to my chromecast Ultra. Definitely returning this.
customer_reviews.author: J Muff

customer_reviews.title: A bit laggy but works well for its price base.
customer_reviews.text: I keeping having to reboot in order to reduce lag. Other than that it works well. Very good interface ,almost as good as Nvidia Shield for a fraction of the cost. Just wish it was a little bit more stable. remote is easy to navigate and feels good in the hand.
customer_reviews.author: Ray D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV Box but cheap remote...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent TV box, easy setup, great android tv apps (netflix, fox, hbo, yotube, kodi, etc...), fast as expected, great image quality at FHD and 4K. BUT... cheap remote control, keys are full noisy, it's so terrible... but it working well, voice recognition it's ok better than expected. overall 4.5 rating because remote control...
customer_reviews.author: Marco Meza

customer_reviews.title: Great streaming device
customer_reviews.text: This box does everything I need for 4 k display. One thing I would watch out for is that it does not have all the apps available. It was very easy to setup it did not take much effort. User interface makes it simple to navigate it became even better after taking the default display off 720 p and into 4k.
customer_reviews.author: Maxim

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: It had great potential. User interface is great, remote is great and it’s fast. However, after a couple of days, the apps started freezing causing me to have to unplug it to reset it daily. I did a hard reset and started all over again....same problem. Also shuts itself down to reboot randomly. If I was still within the return window I would return it.
customer_reviews.author: TiaraS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Android TV box
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Android TV box. I am using it for IpTV service and its going good so far.
customer_reviews.author: @mit

customer_reviews.title: Pile of garbage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to play twitch since Amazon is an jerk and wont let Roku have a twitch app. This box turned out to be trash as it can hardly handle its main menu let alone a streaming application. Slow to navigate and freezes up while streaming, needing constant restarts. Had to switch back to my Chromecast which works just fine for twitch. Stay away from this product, get anything but the Xiaomi Mi Box.
customer_reviews.author: Jake M

customer_reviews.title: True Android
customer_reviews.text: Great little box pack full of features. I found it strange I had to install chrome manually as it was missing from OS. It works. I upgraded to Android 9 and the apps I use still works post upgrade. However, there is a known bug with Android 9 OS and the MIC in remote control if you are using any external USB devices such as a mouse and KEYB, you have to remove USB device first if you want to use the MIC for voice commands.
customer_reviews.author: hamoja

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend it
customer_reviews.text: At the beginning was good but after only a week it starts to freezes periodically and apps doesn’t respond quickly! I have to click many time and wait until it works.
customer_reviews.author: Sameer

customer_reviews.title: Android 9 rollout is a complete mess. Returning.
customer_reviews.text: It was working fine until the Android 9 update. Looks like Xiaomi completely messed up with the Android 9 rollout. And impossible to downgrade ack to Android 8. A shame being given how they dare to roll out such Beta-like update. Now it's completely buggy and it messes with my Philips Hue Sync box on my 4K TV's and its CEC features. Returning it and will never buy a MiBox ever again.
customer_reviews.author: fiso42

customer_reviews.title: The best Android Box on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, my daughters loved it. The voice command works well and navigation in the menus is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Good Android Box
customer_reviews.text: Box works great; purchased as an Android update. No issues! Remote sucks; have not tried voice. Purchased a mini bluetooth keyboard remote to use instead.
customer_reviews.author: missklyn

customer_reviews.title: A lot of bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tv box, an excellent wifi antenna, integrated chromecast and lots of available apps. Games don't work well but I didn't expect it to. Loving it
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Parrado

customer_reviews.title: Decent Android box for kitchen/bedroom.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great Android box for the 2nd room. Its not in the same ballpark as a Nvidia shield. The shield is way more powerful and had no problems with 4k. The mi box works best on 1080p resolution.
customer_reviews.author: steve craig

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok I’m just so use to my F Stick
customer_reviews.text: Been using for a couple weeks now it’s alright but I love my firesticks better if you into android devices give it a try might work better for you
customer_reviews.author: Indio

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Great little box. Easy to learn. Highly recommend it. I can cast anything from my phone if the app is not included. I'm s great.
customer_reviews.author: Marah

customer_reviews.title: In general it's okay
customer_reviews.text: The interface is a little mesh and some restrictions seems strange (e.g. you can't use Chrome here). But in general it's okay and good volume for money.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Fedyunin

customer_reviews.title: Requires reboot after sleep
customer_reviews.text: Over all, it was pretty good for the price. I ended up unhooking it and purchasing the Nvidia Shield Pro which I should have done in the first place. Once this box goes to sleep, after waking up it is unbearably laggy until you reboot the box. I'm not sure if there is a workaround for this but it was just annoying enough that I'll probably give it away for Christmas next year.
customer_reviews.author: Neur0s1s

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: This box is way slower and way worse than the original I’ve had for going on three years. Chrome cast functionality is non existent videos play out of sync. Is also slower than molasses. Do yourself a favor and stay far away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Jones

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Great device for the money. Fast and responsive remote. Better than Chromecast ultra in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Miscpicker

customer_reviews.title: Try It
customer_reviews.text: I returned it because I realized I didn’t need it. A friend said it works great in his semi
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: The worst product it stop working after some time
customer_reviews.text: The worst item I've ever bought, it has stopped working because of an wifi issue, I have writen several mails to the customer service and they say can't resolve the problem and they've left the issue so. And Amzon don't have how to report this request.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Ferreira

customer_reviews.title: Finally I got Hbo Go Latam
customer_reviews.text: I had been struggling with the Fire Tv 4K to get hbo go latam and directv go but no luck, however with this just took 5 mins to get all done!!!! I'm really happy with this and avoid to invest on a new tv :)
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Salgado

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Access to Netflix Disney + Amazon video, and more Easy to program &add app.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was the best
customer_reviews.text: The box was working perfect but now I can't play anything on Netflix YouTube disney+ and hulu and I don't know why. It won't even let me cast those apps through the chromecast I can only cast third party videos
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to work with. Not intuitive at all
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to work with. Not intuitive at all. The Vankyo AndroidTV box is better.
customer_reviews.author: Chrispdx

customer_reviews.title: Almost great.
customer_reviews.text: The box needs to be unplugged and plugged back in almost every day. It works normally after doing so.. Though this is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Paraczky

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Android Tv Box
customer_reviews.text: This android tv box is amazing. Easy to set up, it is super fast, it is way better than i expected. I installed all my favorite apps which is Kodi & Popcorn time and they work great !!!
customer_reviews.author: Terry McGuirk

customer_reviews.title: Make and lcd a smart TV
customer_reviews.text: Great product if you want to make a tv smart. I recommend getting a bluetooth keyboard. For setup
customer_reviews.author: Bill T

customer_reviews.title: Great Android streaming device
customer_reviews.text: Great streaming device for the money compared to other Android boxes
customer_reviews.author: Edog323

customer_reviews.title: Sigh.
customer_reviews.text: Not compatible with USB inputs and device is incompatible with Hulu.
customer_reviews.author: Jelly Face

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: It does not work well! It freezes all the time. We have to reboot it. We gave up after 2 months and bought a roku.
customer_reviews.author: J. Balma

customer_reviews.title: Consistently good product.
customer_reviews.text: Mi Boxes are good quality items. We buy a lot of them for work and recommend them for our clients to run our streaming app.
customer_reviews.author: Lando

customer_reviews.title: Good value and Android performance
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 at home and have given them as gifts to family. All well performing. I also have an Nvidia Shield as our primary. All work well.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Make sure correct outlet
customer_reviews.text: They sent me some weird plug that will not work in USA
customer_reviews.author: oliverc27

customer_reviews.title: Not a smooth experience
customer_reviews.text: Lots of apps frequently buffer or freeze, when they work fine on Chromecast. Voice control is clunky. No mute button. Got it for the remote, which works great, but it's not worth the issues above.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Henckel

customer_reviews.title: Malfunction!
customer_reviews.text: A few weeks into usage the Youtube app gives me a green screen with only the sound running in the background when playing a video. Please contact me as I need the device replaced with a working one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, very happy with the purchase and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda Ciprian

customer_reviews.title: The power system  is poor
customer_reviews.text: The power system (port/code/charger ) just cant work anymore in less than six month after I bough, which leaves me without the box. The picture quality when it is working is high. The power thing messed me up
customer_reviews.author: Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Great OFFICIAL Androind TV Box, Needs More Ram!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic box, but the limited 8gb of ram is honestly laughable in this day and age.
customer_reviews.author: JohnWPB

customer_reviews.title: Will not screen mirror/google cast
customer_reviews.text: Will not cast from samsung galaxy s9. With or without wifi. With or without the google home app. 70$ and it cant manage a simple screen mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: This is how Android TV is supposed to look like!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like certified Android TV box If you hate needing to have keyboard with your media center device try this. Only device that will run true Youtube TV for android TV
customer_reviews.author: eric andrychow

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: From the first two days it starts to freeze a lot, I gave it time maybe it will get better, but It has got even worse. DON’T waste your money on it. I’ll return it.
customer_reviews.author: Bashayer

customer_reviews.title: The jury is still out.
customer_reviews.text: This product had issues with internet connectivity and buffering. I also have a Roku TV and a fire stick neither of which has this issue. It could be just a particular unit that I got so I am exchanging it and giving them another shot. So at this point the jury is still out.
customer_reviews.author: Darzu

customer_reviews.title: Voice don't work
customer_reviews.text: To many issues to start. Voice doesn't work and if you have to reset the color it will over bleed colors or just go black and white.
customer_reviews.author: Marquis Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Better than those AMLogic or Rockchip boxes.
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the run-of-the-mill Chinese "Android TV Box" units. This one actually has the official Android TV (LeanBack) launcher and a Netflix client that doesn't function like it expects a touch interface.
customer_reviews.author: Agent TechnoMan

customer_reviews.title: Go for it
customer_reviews.text: Great choice for the price. Fast, simple, great quality and compatibility. WiFi adapter has a very good range
customer_reviews.author: Caubarrere

customer_reviews.title: Impressive device
customer_reviews.text: Great bang for buck. Have a few of them. Responsive and reliable. It's basically a mini Nvidia shield tv device. The remote is better too. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: A great Android box!
customer_reviews.text: A great small Android box. Well worth the money. Very happy with the performance. Highly recommended..
customer_reviews.author: Lyndon Thomason

customer_reviews.title: Sweeg views
customer_reviews.text: Awesome upgrade from the old one that is still bad ass to just more features on this one
customer_reviews.author: andrew     batesole

customer_reviews.title: Everything with Amazon is awesome
customer_reviews.text: For better TV programs, movies, TV shows, sports news, everything.

customer_reviews.title: Can I watch chinese channel directly?
customer_reviews.text: It is very good. Running fast and you can install any app which you like.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The product was very good but it’s not the one I want.
customer_reviews.author: Q.T

customer_reviews.title: The best official box for the money
customer_reviews.text: Swift interface that doesn't crash. Play store is limited so downloading of some apps required a work around.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Parms

customer_reviews.title: A good product
customer_reviews.text: A good item I saw the negative comments, I can say that with me everything worked out I have nothing to complain about the Xiaomi Mi Box S 4k Android TV .. everything works perfect, positive point for the seller
customer_reviews.author: Robson d.

customer_reviews.title: Its just wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Its just the best buy for the price/quality It's a littleleazy with voice recognition, but as me and my girl never use it, it's just perfect for us.

customer_reviews.title: User friendly. Fast Response
customer_reviews.text: It is really a Android TV Box and has TV features not like other boxes. For example, you can download DirecTV Go.

customer_reviews.title: Package
customer_reviews.text: Only thing is that am handicapped and i had to go to the office to get my packages I will love for it to be left on my front door
customer_reviews.author: Wilfredo Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Not what expected after having the mi3, the mi6, and now the mi9.
customer_reviews.text: This device is not comparable with a basic universal remote. The remote must have wifi to pair with this device. All other features work great. Definitely 4K but no optical sound output a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: don

customer_reviews.title: Cool but not enough memory
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the product. Only reason not giving it 5 stars is the onboard memory. It is just too small.

customer_reviews.text: The produuct was not new was mossing the remote it had and account set also it had a weird white talc kind pf thing

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: very useful, smooth and never had problem with installation and jumping from one application to another.

customer_reviews.text: When it said there was a update avialable, I clicked the buttom. I am wrong!!! System is very bad, after you update the system. And you can't get back!

customer_reviews.title: It works well.

customer_reviews.text: The device tends to stuck in the Netflix app. It has to be rebooted each time. I have to do it once every few days.

product_meta.title: Xiaomi Mi Box S Android TV with Google Assistant Remote Streaming Media Player - Chromecast Built-in - 4K HDR - Wi-Fi - 8 GB - Black
product_meta.description: Connect to a world of content and entertainment at home with Mi Box S. Running on the latest Android TV 8. 1 is easy to use, supports voice controls and your favorite apps such as Netflix, VUDU, YouTube, SlingTV and more! Experience stunning 4K HDR visuals and DOLBY DTS for an immersive experience. Catch your favorite TV shows, play games, watch the news or listen to the radio. Mi Box also recommends videos based on your personal YouTube and Google Play preferences.
feature_bullets: Powered by Android 8. 1 for Superior Functionality: Enjoy the latest Version of Android TV 8. 1, perfect for home entertainment, home theater, business use, and more
Access Tons of Content: Access to 3000+ channels and Apps, Enjoy movies and TV episodes from Netflix, VUDU, YouTube, and more
High Clarity 4K HDR: Chromecast built-in. Supports 4K Ultra HD resolution and High Dynamic Range (HDR), experience clarity and smoothness like never before
Voice Control that Does It All: Built-In Google Assistant and in Apps voice search. Search for photos, check the weather, set an alarm. Life should be simple.
High Performance Storage Capacity: Powerful Quad-core CPU, 3+2-core GPU, provides fast and stable rendering to enjoy a high quality video experience

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars690 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
